title: Dot and the Smugglers
brief_description: A circus owner attempts to capture a mysterious Bunyip, but Dot and her bushland friends try to foil his plans. Dot soon discovers that the circus is merely a front for an international wildlife smuggling operation. Backed by her pals Burra the Kookaburra and two boxing Kangaroos, Dot goes on the warpath.
